name: qr-canvas-js
description: Minimal, zero-dependency QR code generator for canvas

scripts.build: esbuild src/qr-canvas.js --bundle --format=iife --global-name=QRCanvas --outfile=dist/qr-canvas.iife.js --banner:js="// qr-canvas-js v1.1.0 | MIT" && esbuild src/qr-canvas.js --bundle --format=iife --global-name=QRCanvas --minify --outfile=dist/qr-canvas.min.js --banner:js="// qr-canvas-js v1.1.0 | MIT"

author: Matthew Keller
